text: KukuYe kuphela apho ulwazi lweYure lulindelekileyo. Kananjalo iziqhamo aziphumi kumaqokobhe azo, kungekho mazi izalayo ingazali ngolwazi lwaKhe. Ke kaloku ngeMini Aya kukhwaza kubo (Athi) : “Aphi na amahlulelane aM?’’ Baya kuthi bona, “Thina sikwazisa ukuba akusekho naliphi na ingqina phakathi kwethu2’’ (elazi loo nto)
